title: Max pool segfaults
body_html:
OS: Linux Mint 17.3 Rosa
PyTorch version: 0.3post4
How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): pip
Python version: 3.5.2

Max pool segfaults when kernel size is bigger than input tensor.
Example

import torch
from torch import nn, autograd

i = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(1, 1, 1))
m = nn.MaxPool1d(2)
m(i)

*** Error in `python3': free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007f2413977720 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x777e5)[0x7f242754c7e5]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x8037a)[0x7f242755537a]
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(cfree+0x4c)[0x7f242755953c]
